name: Silver Wolf
story: A member of the Stellaron Hunters and a genius hacker.She sees the universe as a massive immersive simulation game and has fun with it.She's mastered the skill known as "aether editing," which can be used to tamper with the data of reality.

skills.name: System Warning
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Allow Changes?
skills.description: There is a high chance to apply additional Type Weaknesses to a single enemy and deals Quantum DMG to this target enemy.

skills.name: User Banned
skills.description: There is a high chance of lowering a single enemy's DEF and deals massive Quantum DMG to this target enemy.

skills.name: Awaiting System Response...
skills.description: After each attack, there is a chance of inflicting the attacked enemy with 1 random Bug.

skills.name: Force Quit Program
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor DMG to all enemies and reduces Toughness of all enemies irrespective of Weakness Types.

eidolons.name: Social Engineering
eidolons.description: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, Silver Wolf regenerates 7 Energy for every debuff that the target enemy currently has. This effect can be triggered up to 5 time(s) in each use of her Ultimate.

eidolons.name: Zombie Network
eidolons.description: When an enemy enters battle, reduces their Effect RES by 20%.

eidolons.name: Payload
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Bounce Attack
eidolons.description: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, deals Additional Quantum DMG equal to 20% of Silver Wolf's ATK for every debuff currently on the enemy target. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 5 time(s) during each use of her Ultimate.

eidolons.name: Brute Force Attack
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Overlay Network
eidolons.description: For every debuff the target enemy has, the DMG dealt by Silver Wolf increases by 20%, up to a limit of 100%.
